name: unvdif

stmt.origin: 3eqtri(cun(c0, cdif(universe, c0)), universe, cdif(universe, cin(cdif(universe, c0), cdif(universe, cdif(universe, c0)))), cdif(universe, emptycls))

-| wceq(cdif(universe, emptycls), universe)

comment: The union of a class and its complement is the universe. Theorem 5.1(5) of [Stoll] p. 17. (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2004.)
